abstract: Tech Tip Q&A; displaying different time zones in Google Calendar to help set up meeting times with two separate offices discussed.
lead_paragraph: If you have to manage meetings in different parts of the world, you can make Google Calendar show two or more time zones at once in your browser.
snippet: If you have to manage meetings in different parts of the world, you can make Google Calendar show two or more time zones at once in your browser....

headline.main: Living in Two Time Zones With Google Calendar
